id_argumento1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
id_argumento2: Ending poverty requires a wide-ranging approach that combines comprehensive social protection systems, inclusive economic policies, investments in human capital, measures to address inequality and climate resilience, and international cooperation and partnership.
label: Rephrase

id_argumento1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
id_argumento2: Despite increasing efforts and commitments to expand social protection programmes, significant coverage gaps left 1.4 billion children uncovered in 2023.
label: Conflict

id_argumento1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
id_argumento2: Achieving universal coverage of social protection will require closing a major financing gap, with upper- and lower-middle-income countries needing to invest an additional $98.1 billion and $88.8 billion, respectively, and low-income countries requiring an additional $59.6 billion.
label: Inference
